name: Style Sprint
desc: StyleSprint is a full-stack e-commerce website built using the MERN stack (MongoDB, Express, React, Node.js) and Tailwind CSS.

name: Web Shop
desc: E-commerce website built using MERN stack. Supports user authentication, product search, cart, payment gateway, order history.

name: Portfolio Website
desc: A Resume Generator that creates customized resumes in just a few minutes based on your requirements. This project includes an auto-deploy feature using GitHub.

name: Crypto Tracker
desc: Crypto Tracker built using ReactJS and Chakra UI. Supports dark mode. API used coingecko.

name: React-Projects
desc: Full-Stack project dashboard which is collection of projects built on the React library.

name: Portfolio Website
desc: Portfolio built using HTML, CSS, Bootstrap, SASS and JavaScript. Customized Bootstrap using SCSS.

name: Bootstrap Template
desc: Basic website template built using HTML and Bootstrap.

name: Foodicious
desc: Basic food website landing page built using HTML, CSS and JavaScript.

name: Food Website
desc: Basic food website landing page built using HTML, CSS, SASS, Bootstrap and jQuery.
